column4: can somebody please tell me how to open a terminal after closing X?
i typed some commands but nothing happened
man you guys are confusing me
i just want to close X get to enter a command then start X and voila!
click on system administration synaptic and search for dict
do i install the dict package ?
I would but that is me and ispell
isn't there a way to add a french server to the default dictionary of ubuntu ? the gnome dictionary i mean
do this search for fr and see what you want to install
k, and do you know how to set language for a openoffice document ? i mean to make it correct the french way and the french words
make sure you have installed all -fr versions before you go looking
now not the DEFAULT language for documents, but the language for a document i already created
